Click notification to return to app

"This application is designed to change the ring volume based on the location of the device, create create a new location use the + button on the home screen from here you can name the location, set if you want the device on loud or vibrate, you can also select if you want the device to swap back to the oposite on leaving the location, each location has a 1 mile radius "
